Title: Return to the Blue Lagoon
Writer: Henry De Vere Stacpoole (book), Leslie Stevens (screenplay)
Actors: Milla Jovovich, Brian Krause, Lisa Pelikan, Courtney Barilla
Plot: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.
